author: Gaukert
post_text: November 22, 2018 at 12:23 AM#1Hey,Can someone tell me how i can make a macro that will progam everything, all presets. I kinda figured some parts out but i cant figure out how can tell the CMD at which value it should store it.Lets say i want to progam a preset called Gobo 1, in this preset there is a G1 Gobo (so its shouldnt take G1<> aswell, only G1) and from the G1 there is a gobo called "Gobo 1.1". How do i store "Gobo 1.1" in a preset with a macro? And how can i make this that it will only select the things i want, ofc change the name but if say G1 to the CMD it includes G1<> aswell.Hope someone can help me out
title: Edit presets with macro's
